Section.Text: repealed, 1992, c. 1, s. 146(1) (Sch. IX, item 26); 1993, c. 28, s. 78 (Sch. III, item 81), this amendment was repealed before it came into force by 1998, c. 15, s. 27

CoordinatingAmendment.Text: Coordinating amendments, 2001, c. 4, ss. 175 and 176 (will never apply)

Item.Text: — re application to the Province of Saskatchewan, repealed 18.06.92 see SI/92‑120 and SI/92‑137
— re application to the Province of British Columbia, repealed 31.03.92 see s. 146(2)(b)

— re application to the Province of Alberta, repealed on the day preceding the day on which s. 6 of the Judgment Interest Act (Alberta) comes into force see s. 146(2)(c). S. 6 of the Judgment Interest Act (Alberta) in force 01.08.92 see The Alberta Gazette Vol. 88, No. 15, p. 2753
— re application to the Yukon Territory, repealed 30.09.93 see SI/93‑195
— re application to the Province of Manitoba, repealed 30.06.94 see SI/94‑75
— re application to the Northwest Territories, repealed, 31.12.95 see SI/95‑96

CIF.Text: CIF, 1996, c. 17, ss. 17 and 18 repealed before coming into force see 2017, c. 33, s. 228
CIF, 1998, c. 15, s. 27 in force on assent 11.06.98

CIF, 2001, c. 4 (assent: 10.05.2001), ss. 175 and 176 in force on assent but see conditions of application in ss. 175(2) and 176(2) [Note: 1996, c. 17, ss. 17 and 18 mentioned in ss. 175(2) and 176(2) repealed before their coming into force see 2017, c. 33, s. 228]; ss. 91 to 95 in force 01.06.2001 see SI/2001‑71
CIF, 2008, c. 28, s. 155 in force on assent 18.06.2008
CIF, 2017, c. 33 (assent: 14.12.2017), s. 228 deemed in force 01.07.2017 see s. 229
